title: SOLD: 1934 Tour of Japan Postcard with Babe Ruth, Lou Gehrig, etc.
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1934 Tour of Japan Postcard with Babe Ruth, Lou Gehrig, etc.
posts.post_content:
I very recently sold this postcard twice on eBay, once for $240+ and the second time for $220+. Neither buyer paid. eBay continues to get worse.

Will sell it here on the BST for SOLD delivered, with PayPal preferred.

It has some slight paper loss on the front and a vertical crease on the left side.

Please PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url] to purchase or ask any questions.
